General.Name: Balto Resources Ltd
General.Description: Balto Resources Ltd. explores for, evaluates, and develops mineral properties in Canada. It holds a 100% working interest in the SED mineral claims located in the Kamloops mining division, British Columbia. The company was formerly known as Alcor Resources Ltd. and changed its name to Balto Resources Ltd. in June 2008. Balto Resources Ltd. was incorporated in 1973 and is based in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 850 West Hastings Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 1E1
